GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v6.0.7
GSD.description:
tcp: fix a signed-integer-overflow bug in tcp_add_backlog()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.7 by commit 28addf029417d53b1df062b4c87feb7bc033cb5f, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit c9c3321257e1b95be9b375f811fb250162af8d39. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: fix a signed-integer-overflow bug in tcp_add_backlog()
